# Methods

## Alignment steps

Using bowtie2 (v.2.5.4), we created an index genome of **T. repens.** and aligned sequences to the reference genome. We then used the --un-conc-gz function to create a file of unaligned sequence. This sequence file was converted to forward and reverse, and is our exogenous, non t.repens DNA.

## Kraken2 Steps

We build a kraken2 database of bacteria, fungi, viral, and achaean DNA.

```{bash}
kraken2-build --download-taxonomy --db KrakenDB

kraken2-build --download-taxonomy bacteria --db KrakenDB
kraken2-build --download-taxonomy archaea --db KrakenDB
kraken2-build --download-taxonomy viral --db KrakenDB
kraken2-build --download-taxonomy fungi --db KrakenDB
kraken2-build --build --db KrakenDB
```
